titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on adsorbent resin comprised of a macroporous polymer of diethenylbenzene.
